sqls.sql: select * from AT_MX_MM_POLYWEIGHT_PROD where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_name_s??> and CREATED_NAME_S=:created_name_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if error_allow_s??> and ERROR_ALLOW_S=:error_allow_s </#if> <#if error_out_s??> and ERROR_OUT_S=:error_out_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if lot_no_s??> and LOT_NO_S=:lot_no_s </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S=:material_code_s </#if> <#if material_name_s??> and MATERIAL_NAME_S=:material_name_s </#if> <#if real_weight_s??> and REAL_WEIGHT_S=:real_weight_s </#if> <#if receive_time_t??> and RECEIVE_TIME_T=:receive_time_t </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if set_weight_s??> and SET_WEIGHT_S=:set_weight_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if trainprod_id_s??> and TRAINPROD_ID_S=:trainprod_id_s </#if> <#if warning_sgn_s??> and WARNING_SGN_S=:warning_sgn_s </#if> <#if weight_id_s??> and WEIGHT_ID_S=:weight_id_s </#if> <#if weight_time_s??> and WEIGHT_TIME_S=:weight_time_s </#if> <#if weight_type_s??> and WEIGHT_TYPE_S=:weight_type_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_MX_MM_POLYWEIGHT_PROD where 1=1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_name_s??> and CREATED_NAME_S=:created_name_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if error_allow_s??> and ERROR_ALLOW_S=:error_allow_s </#if> <#if error_out_s??> and ERROR_OUT_S=:error_out_s </#if> <#if id_s??> and ID_S=:id_s </#if> <#if lot_no_s??> and LOT_NO_S=:lot_no_s </#if> <#if material_code_s??> and MATERIAL_CODE_S=:material_code_s </#if> <#if material_name_s??> and MATERIAL_NAME_S=:material_name_s </#if> <#if real_weight_s??> and REAL_WEIGHT_S=:real_weight_s </#if> <#if receive_time_t??> and RECEIVE_TIME_T=:receive_time_t </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if set_weight_s??> and SET_WEIGHT_S=:set_weight_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if trainprod_id_s??> and TRAINPROD_ID_S=:trainprod_id_s </#if> <#if warning_sgn_s??> and WARNING_SGN_S=:warning_sgn_s </#if> <#if weight_id_s??> and WEIGHT_ID_S=:weight_id_s </#if> <#if weight_time_s??> and WEIGHT_TIME_S=:weight_time_s </#if> <#if weight_type_s??> and WEIGHT_TYPE_S=:weight_type_s </#if>
